rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Agent asks if the patient is new or existing
rules.example: Are you a new or existing patient with our office?

rules.title: Inquire About Dental Insurance (New Patient)
rules.condition: Customer identified as a new patient
rules.action: Agent asks if they have dental insurance
rules.example: Since you're a new patient, do you have dental insurance?

rules.title: Collect Insurance Name
rules.action: Agent asks for the name of their insurance provider
rules.example: Great! What is the name of your dental insurance provider?

rules.title: Confirm Insurance Name Receipt
rules.action: Agent confirms receipt of the insurance name

rules.title: Collect Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: Agent has received the insurance name
rules.action: Agent asks for the type of insurance plan (e.g., PPO/HMO, state insurance)
rules.example: And what type of plan do you have, such as PPO, HMO, or state insurance?

rules.title: Assist with Insurance Plan Type Identification
rules.condition: Patient expresses uncertainty or inability to identify their insurance plan type (e.g., PPO/HMO).
rules.action: Agent offers clarification or examples to help the patient identify their plan type.
rules.example: A PPO plan usually gives you more flexibility to choose your own dentist, while an HMO often requires you to pick one within a network. Does that help you remember?

rules.title: Prepare for Insurance Verification
rules.condition: Agent has successfully collected the patient's insurance provider name and plan type.
rules.action: Agent logs into the internal system to initiate the insurance verification process.
rules.example: Thank you for providing those details. I'll just log into our system now to check your benefits.

rules.title: Inform Insurance Acceptance
rules.action: Agent informs the patient if their insurance is accepted or if the office is out of network

rules.title: Repeat Last Question
rules.condition: Customer asks for clarification on the last question
rules.example: Certainly, I was asking [repeat last question].
